alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson; Shawnee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 7:22AM CDT until May 15 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jefferson County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Douglas County in east central Kansas... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 721 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northeast of Winchester to Richland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 720 AM Topeka Billard Airport reported a wind gust to 61 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Topeka, Lawrence, Baldwin City, Oskaloosa, Tecumseh, Eudora, Richland, Perry, McLouth, Meriden, Ozawkie, Nortonville, Lecompton, Clinton, Winchester, Lone Star, Pleasant Grove, Vinland, Pauline and Williamstown. This includes Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 172 and 205. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
